Arcane Trapsmith

Prerequisite: Artificer, training in Thievery
Benefit: You can use your Intelligence modifier instead of your Dexterity modifier when making Thievery checks to disable traps or open locks. You gain a +4 feat bonus to Arcana checks related to traps or hazards.

Published in Dragon Magazine 403.
